post.author: 황성규
post.content:
Subject: Big Thank You From YMCA Date: Thu, 9 Dec 2004 13:23:38 -0600 From: "Lee, Michelle" <Michelle.Lee@YMCA.NET> Add to Address Book To: mkim777@hotmail.com, asheen777@yahoo.com, kwon96@gmail.com, brendan_ace@hotmail.com, skhwang99@yahoo.com, "Thomas Lee" <thomas.lee@storageasp.net>
Hi, everyone.
This is to say thank you for coming for the workshop last week.
The feedback from participants was very positive and I have heard some good comments on the workshop.
I apologize for the low participation. It was partly because holiday season is coming, but mainly because I wasn’t able to fully promote the workshop as I was away for vacation. Once again, I am so sorry, and really appreciate your continued cooperation.
(In addition, please let me know your mailing address, so that we can send out our New Year Greetings)
Best Regards,
Michelle Lee
Settlement Worker
YMCA of Greater Toronto
Korean Community Services
Tel: 416-538-9412
Fax: 416-538-1778
Michelle.lee@ymca.net
post.title: Big Thank You From YMCA
